thread.title: Quindell says to acquire remaining 50.1 pct of PT Healthcare
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Quindell says to acquire remaining 50.1 pct of PT Healthcare | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Quindell says to acquire remaining 50.1 pct of PT Healthcare
text:
Sept 9 Quindell Plc :
* Acquisition of remaining 50.1 pct of PT Healthcare
* Consideration for issue of 9,466,666 ordinary shares of 15 pence each in company
* Under terms of arrangement agreement, Quindell will issue 9,466,666 ordinary shares in consideration for acquisition
* Completion of acquisition is expected to take place in mid-October 2015 Source text for Eikon: (Bengaluru Newsroom; +44 207 542 1810)
